summary.para: Appends an object to the collection of managed objects.

param.name: punk
param.para: The address of the interface of the object to be added to the list.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM error code otherwise.

summary.para: Removes an object from the collection of managed objects.

param.name: punk
param.para: The address of the interface of the object to be removed from the list.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM error code otherwise.

summary.para: Exposes methods that allow a client to append or remove an object from a collection of objects managed by a server object.

remarks.para: This interface is implemented by objects that manage a collection of other objects. It is exported to allow clients of the object to request that objects be added to or removed from the collection.
Use this interface to add or delete an object from the server object's collection of managed objects.
